thread.title: Redrow reports another jump in profits
thread.title_full: Redrow reports another jump in profits

title: Redrow reports another jump in profits
text:
Redrow reports another jump in profits 8 February 2017 Close share panel Image copyright PA Housebuilder Redrow has reported a 35% rise in pre-tax half-year profits to £140m in the six months to December 2016 after completions went up by 13%. 
Group revenue rose 23% to a first half record of £739m and it increased its dividend payment by 50% to 6p a share. 
The company's private order book was up by 35% at £897m. It also bought East Midlands housebuilder Radleigh Homes. 
Chairman Steve Morgan said: "I have every confidence this will be another year of significant progress." Related Topics
